text.tspan: Go-Based Multi-Module Workspace with NGINX Gateway
Automatic cancellation on timeout or client disconnect
Cache frequently accessed data with TTL-based expiration
All database operations wrapped in transactions
Rollback on error ensures data consistency
Comprehensive logging for debugging and monitoring
15+ Independent Microservices ‚Ä¢ Redis Caching ‚Ä¢ Transaction Safety
Built with Go 1.21+ ‚Ä¢ SQLite Database ‚Ä¢ NGINX Gateway
